Hi, how's everything going? It seems like something is bothering you. Can you talk to me about it?
I just can't understand why people around me are always so judgmental, even my family! It's so frustrating.
Have you tried communicating with them and let them know how you feel?
Yeah, I did. And I realized that sometimes they are just trying to look out for me, but it comes off in the wrong way.
Maybe you can try to open up to them and have a heart-to-heart conversation. Share your perspective and feelings.
That's a great idea. I'll give it a try. Thank you for listening and for the advice.
You're welcome! I'm always here for you. I hope everything works out for the best.
Me too. Thanks for being such a good friend.
